titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Boston College men's ice hockey team on winning its fifth National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Hockey Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/25/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes Boston College for winning the 2012 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Hockey Championship.
